sp.speaker: BURR
sp.l: It must be nice, it must be nice to have
Washington on your side
It must be nice, it must be nice to have
Washington on your side

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON
sp.l: Ev’ry action has its equal, opposite reactions
Thanks to Hamilton, our cab’net’s fractured into factions
Try not to crack under the stress, we’re breaking down like fractions
We smack each other in the press, and we don’t print retractions
I get no satisfaction witnessing his fits of passion
The way he primps and preens and dresses like the pits of fashion
Our poorest citizens, our farmers, live ration to ration
As Wall Street robs ‘em blind in search of chips to cash in
This prick is askin’ for someone to bring him to task
Somebody gimme some dirt on this vacuous mass so we can at last unmask him
I’ll pull the trigger on him, someone load the gun and cock it
While we were all watching, he got Washington in his pocket

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON AND BURR
sp.l: It must be nice, it must be nice to have
Washington on your side
It must be nice, it must be nice to have
Washington on your side
Look back at the Bill of Rights

sp.speaker: MADISON
sp.l: Which I wrote

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON/BURR
sp.l: The ink hasn’t dried
It must be nice, it must be nice to have
Washington on your side

sp.speaker: MADISON
sp.l: So he’s doubled the size of the government
Wasn’t the trouble with much of our previous government size?

sp.speaker: BURR
sp.l: Look in his eyes!

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON
sp.l: See how he lies

sp.speaker: MADISON
sp.l: Follow the scent of his enterprise

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON
sp.l: Centralizing national credit
And making American credit competitive

sp.speaker: MADISON
sp.l: If we don’t stop it we aid and abet it

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON
sp.l: I have to resign

sp.speaker: MADISON
sp.l: Somebody has to stand up for the South!

sp.speaker: BURR
sp.l: Somebody has to stand up to his mouth!

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON
sp.l: If there’s a fire you’re trying to douse

sp.speaker: MADISON AND JEFFERSON
sp.l: You can’t put it out from inside the house

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON
sp.l: I’m in the cabinet. I am complicit in
Watching him grabbin’ at power and kiss it
If Washington isn’t gon’ listen
To disciplined dissidents, this is the difference:
This kid is out!

sp.speaker: MADISON/BURR/JEFFERSON
sp.l: Oh!
This immigrant isn’t somebody we chose
Oh!
This immigrant’s keeping us all on our toes
Oh!
Let’s show these Federalists who they’re up against!
Oh!

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON
sp.l: Southern motherfuckin’—

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON/BURR
sp.l: Democratic-Republicans!

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON/BURR/ENSEMBLE
sp.l: Oh!

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON/BURR
sp.l: Let’s follow the money and see where it goes

sp.speaker: ENSEMBLE
sp.l: Oh!

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON/BURR
sp.l: Because every second the Treasury grows

sp.speaker: ENSEMBLE
sp.l: Oh!

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON/BURR
sp.l: If we follow the money and see where it leads
Get in the weeds, look for the seeds of
Hamilton’s misdeeds

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON/BURR
sp.l: It must be nice. It must be nice

sp.speaker: MADISON
sp.l: Follow the money and see where it goes

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON/BURR
sp.l: It must be nice. It must be nice

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON
sp.l: The emperor has no clothes

sp.speaker: JEFFERSON/MADISON/BURR
sp.l: We won’t be invisible. We won’t be denied
Still
It must be nice, it must be nice to have
Washington on your side
